channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 新建仓库
item.description: Quick setup — if you’ve done this kind of thing before or HTTPS SSH https://github.com/hughJack/hughjack.github.io.git Get started by creating a new file or uploading an existing file. We recommend every repository include a README, LICENSE, and .gitignore. …or create a new repository on the command line echo "# hughjack.github.io" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/hughJack/hughjack.github.io.git git push -u origin master …or push an existing repository from the command line
